Class FenetreBatiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

              • IHM.FenetreBatiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class FenetreBatiment
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.util.Observer
    Decrit la fenetre de vue en coupe d'un Batiment.
    Author:
    Thomas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
